            })

            $('.scrollTo').click(function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                var ref = $(this).data('ref');
                rolar_para(ref);
            })


            function rolar_para(elemento) {
                $('html, body').animate({
                    scrollTop: $(elemento).offset().top - 150
                }, 'slow');
            }
        })

        $(window).load(function () {

            function number_format(number) {
                return (new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR', {style: 'currency', currency: 'BRL'}).format(number));
            }


            let datatable = $('#table-compare-tickers').DataTable(datatableOptions);

            function abbreviateNumber(number, precision = 2) {
                number = Math.abs(number)
                decPlaces = Math.pow(10, precision);
                var abbrev = ["K", "M", "B", "T"];
                for (var i = abbrev.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
                    var size = Math.pow(10, (i + 1) * 3);
                    if (size <= number) {
                        number = Math.round(number * decPlaces / size) / decPlaces;
                        if ((number == 1000) && (i < abbrev.length - 1)) {
                            number = 1;
                            i++;
                        }
                        number += abbrev[i];
                        break;
                    }
                }
                return number;
            }

            // based on prepared DOM, initialize echarts instance
            const quotationChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('chart-quotation'));

            var cacheQuotation = {
                "1": [],
                "5": [],
                "30": [],
                "182": [],
                "365": [],
                "1825": [],
            }
            let qleft = 70;
            let qright = 25;
            let qmargin = '1%';
            if (screen.width < 600) {
                qleft = 30;
                qright = 8;
                qmargin = '5%';
            }

            let firstPriceCotation = [];
            let lastPriceCotation = [];

            const getSpanColor = (color) => {
                return `<span style='display:inline-block;width:10px;height:10px;background-color:` + color + `;margin-right:5px;'></span>`;
            }

            const getJsonQuotations = (days = 365) => {
                quotationChart.clear();

                let usePayments = ($('#usePayments').val() == 'adjusted');
                let quotationType = 'real';

                if (days > 1825) {
                    if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                        return
                    }
                }

                $(".period-quotation").removeClass('active');
                $(`.period-quotation[data-period=${days}]`).addClass('active');
                $('.simulation_period').html($("#period-quotation-select option:selected").text());

                $(".loading-quotation").show()
                $("#chart-quotation-msg").remove();
                $("#chart-quotation").show()

                let urlQuotation = '/api/cotacoes/acao/chart/bbas3/' + days + '/' + usePayments + '/' + quotationType;

                if (days == 1) {
                    urlQuotation = 'https://investidor10.com.br/api/quotations/one-day/BBAS3/';
                } else if(days == 7) {
                    urlQuotation = 'https://investidor10.com.br/api/quotations/seven-days/BBAS3/';
                }

                $.get(urlQuotation).done(function (data) {
                    const selectedCurrencyEl = $("#ticket-selector-select")
                    const selectedCurrencyVal = selectedCurrencyEl.val();
                    if (selectedCurrencyVal === null) {
                        // quotationChart.clear();
                        const messageStyle = "padding: 60px; font-size: 1.4rem; text-transform: uppercase; color: #5f5f5f; font-weight: lighter;"
                        const messageContent = 'Selecione uma opção de moeda para visualizar o gráfico de cotação.';
                        const message = `<div id="chart-quotation-msg" class="text-center" style="${messageStyle}">${messageContent}</div>`;
                        $("#chart-quotation").prepend(message);
                        return;
                    }
                    response = []
                    responseDolar = []
                    responseEuro = []
                    responseBitCoins = []
                    let dates = []
                    indexY = 0;
                    if (data.length !== 0) {
                        let chartType = selectedCurrencyVal;
                        let quotations = selectedCurrencyVal;
                        let dataReal = data.real;
                        let dataDolar = (days == 1 || days == 7 ) ? data.dollar : data.dolar;
                        let dataEuro = data.euro;
                        let dataBitCoins = data.bitcoins;
                        let series = null;
                        let legend = null;
                        let yAxis = null;

                        const percentMin = 0.98
                        const percentMax = 1.02

                        firstPriceCotation = dataReal[0];
                        lastPriceCotation = dataReal[dataReal.length - 1];
                        simulation();

                        $.each(dataReal, (key, item) => {
                            let date = `${item.created_at.substr(0, 6)}${item.created_at.substr(8, 2)}`;

                            if (days == 1) {
                                // date = `${item.created_at.substr(8, 2)}/${item.created_at.substr(5, 2)}/${item.created_at.substr(2, 2)} ${item.created_at.substr(11, 8)}`;
                                date = item.created_at.substr(11, 5);
                            }
                            if (days == 7) {
                                const day = item.created_at.substr(8, 2);
                                const month = item.created_at.substr(5, 2);
                                date = `${day}/${month}`;
                            }

                            response.push(item.price)
                            dates.push(date)                            
                        })

                        $.each(dataDolar, (key, item) => {
                            responseDolar.push(item.price)
                        })

                        $.each(dataEuro, (key, item) => {
                            responseEuro.push(item.price)
                        })

                        $.each(dataBitCoins, (key, item) => {
                            responseBitCoins.push(item.price)
                        })

                        let seriesReal = {
                            name: 'cotação',
                            type: 'line',
                            yAxisIndex: indexY,
                            data: response
                        }

                        let yAxisReal = {
                            min: Number(Math.min(...response) * percentMin).toFixed(2),
                            max: Number(Math.max(...response) * percentMax).toFixed(2),
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (value) {
                                    const number = numberAbbreviation(value, true);
                                    return screen.width < 600 ? number : 'R$'+ number;
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        let seriesDolar = {
                            name: 'dolar',
                            type: 'line',
                            yAxisIndex: indexY,
                            data: responseDolar
                        }

                        let yAxisDolar = {
                            min: Number(Math.min(...responseDolar) * percentMin).toFixed(2),
                            max: Number(Math.max(...responseDolar) * percentMax).toFixed(2),
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (value) {
                                    const number = numberAbbreviation(value, true);
                                    return screen.width < 600 ? number : '$' + number;
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        let seriesEuro = {
                            name: 'euro',
                            type: 'line',
                            yAxisIndex: indexY,
                            data: responseEuro
                        }

                        let yAxisEuro = {
                            min: Number(Math.min(...responseEuro) * percentMin).toFixed(2),
                            max: Number(Math.max(...responseEuro) * percentMax).toFixed(2),
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (value) {
                                    const number = numberAbbreviation(value, true);
                                    return screen.width < 600 ? number : '€' + number;
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        let seriesBitcoins = {
                            name: 'bitcoins',
                            type: 'line',
                            yAxisIndex: indexY,
                            data: responseBitCoins
                        }

                        let yAxisBitcoins = {
                            min: Number(Math.min(...responseBitCoins) * percentMin).toFixed(2),
                            max: Number(Math.max(...responseBitCoins) * percentMax).toFixed(2),
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (value) {
                                    const number = numberAbbreviation(value, true);
                                    return screen.width < 600 ? number : 'BTC '+ number;
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        series = [];
                        yAxis = [];
                        if (!chartType) {
                            chartType = 'real';
                            series = [seriesReal];
                            yAxis = [yAxisReal];
                        } else {
                            $(quotations).each(function (i, e) {
                                indexY = i;
                                if (e === 'real') {
                                    seriesReal.yAxisIndex = indexY;
                                    seriesReal.name = 'R$';

                                    series.push(seriesReal);
                                    yAxis.push(yAxisReal);
                                }

                                if (e === 'dolar') {
                                    seriesDolar.yAxisIndex = indexY;
                                    seriesDolar.name = '$';
                                    series.push(seriesDolar);
                                    yAxis.push(yAxisDolar);
                                }

                                if (e === 'euro') {
                                    seriesEuro.yAxisIndex = indexY;
                                    seriesEuro.name = '€';
                                    series.push(seriesEuro);
                                    yAxis.push(yAxisEuro);
                                }

                                if (e === 'bitcoins') {
                                    seriesBitcoins.yAxisIndex = indexY;
                                    seriesBitcoins.name = 'BTC';
                                    series.push(seriesBitcoins);
                                    yAxis.push(yAxisBitcoins);
                                }
                            });
                        }

                        let xAxisInterval = 'auto';
                        const datesShow = new Set(); // Nao exibir labels duplicadas no grafico
                        if (days == 7) {
                            xAxisInterval = (_, value) => {
                                if (datesShow.has(value)) {
                                    return false;
                                }
                                
                                datesShow.add(value);
                                return true;
                            }
                        }

                        const hasOnlyOneCurrency = series.length === 1;
                        const defaultYAxisConfig = {
                            type: 'value',
                            minInterval: 0.01,
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (value) {
                                    console.log(numberAbbreviation(value, true))
                                    if (screen.width < 600) {
                                        return numberAbbreviation(value, true)
                                    }
                                    return 'R$' + numberAbbreviation(value, true)
                                },
                                color: "#778698",
                            },
                            splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#f5f6f7' } },
                            axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                            min: Number(Math.min(...response) * percentMin).toFixed(2),
                            max: Number(Math.max(...response) * percentMax).toFixed(2),
                        };
                        quotationChart.setOption({
                            animation: false,
                            legend: legend,
                            grid: {
                                left: qmargin,
                                top: 25,
                                right: qmargin,
                                bottom: 25,
                                containLabel: true
                            },
                            xAxis: {
                                type: 'category',
                                boundaryGap: true,
                                data: dates,
                                axisLabel: {
                                    color: "#778698",
                                    interval: xAxisInterval
                                },
                                axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                            },
                            yAxis: yAxis.map(y => ({
                                ...defaultYAxisConfig,
                                ...y,
                                axisLabel: { ...defaultYAxisConfig.axisLabel, ...y.axisLabel },
                            })),
                            tooltip: {
                                trigger: "axis",
                                axisPointer: {
                                    type: "cross",
                                    animation: !1,
                                    label: {
                                        backgroundColor: "#ccc",
                                        borderColor: "#aaa",
                                        borderWidth: 1,
                                        shadowBlur: 0,
                                        shadowOffsetX: 0,
                                        shadowOffsetY: 0,
                                        textStyle: {
                                            color: "#222"
                                        }
                                    }
                                },
                                formatter: function (n) {
                                                let formatter = '';
                                                $(n).each(function (i, e) {
                                                    if (e.seriesName == 'R$') {
                                                        formatter += (getSpanColor(e.color) + `R$ ${numberAbbreviation(e.value, true)}<br/>`);
                                                    } else if (e.seriesName == '€') {
                                                        formatter += (getSpanColor(e.color) + `€ ${numberAbbreviation(e.value, true)} <br/>`);
                                                    } else if (e.seriesName == '$') {
                                                        formatter += (getSpanColor(e.color) + `$ ${numberAbbreviation(e.value, true)} <br/>`);
                                                    } else {
                                                        formatter += (getSpanColor(e.color) + `BTC ${numberAbbreviation(e.value, true)} <br/>`);
                                                    }
                                                });

                                                formatter += `${n[0].name}`;

                                                return formatter;
                                            }
                            },
                            series: series.map(serie => ({
                                type: 'line',
                                sampling: 'average',
                                smooth: false,
                                showSymbol: false, // bolinhas nos cantos
                                itemStyle: {
                                    color: hasOnlyOneCurrency ? '#A07D45' : null,
                                },
                                areaStyle: {
                                    color: hasOnlyOneCurrency
                                        ? new echarts.graphic.LinearGradient(0, 0, 0, 1, [
                                            { offset: 0, color: '#F7EEDF'},
                                            { offset: 1, color: '#F7EEDF' }
                                        ])
                                        : "#FFF",
                                },
                                data: response,
                                ...serie
                            }))
                        });

                        var base_element = $('.select2-multiple2');
                        thatQuotation = $(base_element).val();
                        let itemTicker = $("#item-ticker-selector");

                        if ($(thatQuotation).size() == 2) {
                            itemTicker.addClass('margin-bottom-20');
                        } else if ($(thatQuotation).size() == 1) {
                            itemTicker.removeClass('margin-bottom-20');
                        }

                        $(".loading-quotation").hide()
                        return true;
                    }
                    simulation();
                    $(".loading-quotation, #chart-quotation").hide()
                    $("#chart-quotation").parent().append('<div id="chart-quotation-msg" class="text-center" style="padding: 60px; font-size: 1.4rem; text-transform: uppercase; color: #5f5f5f; font-weight: lighter;">Não há dados de cotação para o período selecionado</div>')

                }).always(() => {
                    // quotationChart.resize();
                    $(".loading-quotation").hide();
                });
            }

            var netRevenueChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('chart-net-debt'));

            let nrcLeft = 10;
            if (screen.width < 600) {
                nrcLeft = 0;
            }

            netRevenueOption = {
                tooltip: {
                    trigger: 'axis',
                    axisPointer: {
                        type: 'shadow'
                    }
                },
                grid: {
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    bottom: '3%',
                    containLabel: true
                }
            };

            netRevenueChart.setOption(netRevenueOption);

            var assetsLiabilitiesChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('chart-assets-liabilities'));

            let alcLeft = 10;
            if (screen.width < 600) {
                alcLeft = 0;
            }
            assetsLiabilitiesOption = {
                tooltip: {
                    trigger: 'axis',
                    axisPointer: {
                        type: 'shadow'
                    }
                },
                grid: {
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    bottom: '3%',
                    containLabel: true
                }
            };

            // use configuration item and data specified to show chart
            assetsLiabilitiesChart.setOption(assetsLiabilitiesOption);

            const getJsonNetRevenue = (days = 5, quarter = false) => {
                $("#loading-net-revenue").show()
                $.get('/api/balancos/receitaliquida/chart/35/' + days + '/' + quarter + '/').done(function (data) {
                    const netProfit = [];
                    const netRevenue = [];
                    const cost = [];
                    const period = [];

                    $.each(data, (key, item) => {
                        netRevenue.push(item.net_revenue)
                        netProfit.push(item.net_profit)
                        cost.push(item.cost)
                        let periodTemp = item.year
                        if (item.quarter > 0) {
                            periodTemp = `${item.year}${item.quarter}`
                        }
                        period.push(periodTemp)
                    });

                    netRevenueChart.setOption({
                        legend: {
                            data: ['Receita Líquida', 'Lucro Líquido'],
                            type: 'scroll',
                        },
                        tooltip: {
                            trigger: "axis",
                            axisPointer: {
                                type: "shadow"
                            },
                            formatter: function (n) {
                                let text = "";
                                let year = "";
                                n.forEach(function (n) {
                                    year = n.name.substring(0, 4);
                                    quarter = n.name.substring(4, 5);
                                    let titleText = `${quarter}T${year}`
                                    if (quarter === "0" || quarter === "") {
                                        titleText = year;
                                    }

                                    if (n.name[0] === 'Ú') {
                                        titleText = n.name;
                                    }

                                    year = `<span style="display:block;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;line-height:13pt; text-align: center">${titleText}</span>`;
                                    text += `<span style="display:flex; align-items: center;">
                                            <span style="display:block; width:10px; height:10px; margin-right: 5px; padding:1px; border-radius:10px; background-color:${n.color}"></span>
                                            <span style="display:block; margin-top:5px">
                                                <span style="display:block; font-size:8pt;line-height:9pt">${n.seriesName.toUpperCase()}:</span>
                                                <span style="display:block;font-weight: bold; font-size:9pt; line-height:10pt">R$ ${numberAbbreviation(n.value, true)}</span>
                                            </span>
                                        </span>`
                                });
                                return `<div style="padding: 10px"> ${year + text}</div>`;
                            }
                        },
                        series: [
                            {
                                smooth: true,
                                name: 'Receita Líquida',
                                type: 'bar',
                                barMaxWidth: '60px',
                                stack: 'one',
                                data: netRevenue,
                                color: "#0D9066",
                                itemStyle: {
                                    normal: { barBorderRadius: [5, 5, 0, 0] }
                                },
                            },
                            {
                                smooth: true,
                                name: 'Lucro Líquido',
                                type: 'line',
                                data: netProfit,
                                color: "#C5B380"
                            }

                        ],
                        xAxis: {
                            data: period,
                            type: "category",
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (n) {
                                    let year = n.substring(0, 4);
                                    let quarter = n.substring(4, 5);
                                    let text = `${quarter}T${year}`
                                    if (quarter === "0" || quarter === "") {
                                        text = year;
                                    }

                                    if (n[0] === 'Ú') {
                                        return n;
                                    }

                                    return text
                                },
                                color: "#778698",
                            },
                            axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                        },
                        yAxis: {
                            type: "value",
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (n) {
                                    if (screen.width < 600) {
                                        return numberAbbreviation(n, false, true)
                                    }
                                    return "R$ " + numberAbbreviation(n)
                                },
                                color: "#778698"
                            },
                            splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                            axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                        },
                    });
                    $("#loading-net-revenue").hide();
                });
            }

            const getJsonAssetsLiabilities = (days = 5) => {
                $("#loading-assets-liabilities").show()
                $.get('/api/balancos/ativospassivos/chart/35/' + days + '/').done(function (data) {

                    const netWorth = [];
                    const net_revenue = [];
                    const net_profit = [];
                    const year = [];

                    $.each(data, (key, item) => {
                        netWorth.push(item.net_worth)
                        net_revenue.push(item.net_revenue)
                        net_profit.push(item.net_profit)
                        year.push(item.year)
                    });
                    let qtop = 50;
                    if (screen.width < 600) {
                        qtop = 100;
                    }

                    assetsLiabilitiesChart.setOption({
                        legend: {
                            data: ['Patrimônio', 'Receita Líquida', 'Lucro Líquido'],
                            type: 'scroll',
                        },
                        grid: {
                            top: qtop
                        },
                        tooltip: {
                            trigger: "axis",
                            axisPointer: {
                                type: "shadow"
                            },
                            formatter: function (n) {
                                let text = "";
                                let year = "";
                                n.forEach(function (n, i) {
                                    year = `<span style="display:block;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;line-height:13pt; text-align: center">${n.name}</span>`;
                                    text += `<span style="display:flex; align-items: center;">
                                            <span style="display:block; width:10px; height:10px; margin-right: 5px; padding:1px; border-radius:10px; background-color:${n.color}"></span>
                                            <span style="display:block; margin-top:5px">
                                                <span style="display:block; font-size:8pt;line-height:9pt">${n.seriesName.toUpperCase()}:</span>
                                                <span style="display:block;font-weight: bold; font-size:9pt; line-height:10pt">R$ ${numberAbbreviation(n.value, true)}</span>
                                            </span>
                                        </span>`
                                });
                                return `<div style="padding: 10px"> ${year + text}</div>`;
                            }
                        },
                        series: [
                            {
                                name: 'Patrimônio',
                                type: 'bar',
                                data: netWorth,
                                color: '#2C3A53',
                                itemStyle: {
                                    normal: {
                                        barBorderRadius: [5, 5, 0, 0],
                                    }
                                },
                            },
                            {
                                smooth: true,
                                name: 'Receita Líquida',
                                type: 'line',
                                data: net_revenue,
                                color: "#8BC34A"
                            },
                            {
                                smooth: true,
                                name: 'Lucro Líquido',
                                type: 'line',
                                data: net_profit,
                                color: "#FF9800"
                            }
                        ],
                        xAxis: {
                            data: year,
                            type: "category",
                            axisLabel: { color: "#778698" },
                            axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                        },
                        yAxis: {
                            type: "value",
                            axisLabel: {
                                formatter: function (n) {
                                    if (screen.width < 600) {
                                        return numberAbbreviation(n, false, true)
                                    }
                                    return "R$ " + numberAbbreviation(n)
                                },
                                color: "#778698",
                            },
                            splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                            axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                        },
                    });
                    $("#loading-assets-liabilities").hide()
                });
            }

            var payoutIndicatorsChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('chart-ticket-payout'));

            alcLeft = 10;
            altRight = 10;
            if (screen.width < 600) {
                alcLeft = 0;
                altRight = 0;
            }
            let payoutIndicatorsOption = {

                tooltip: {
                    trigger: 'axis',
                    axisPointer: {
                        type: 'shadow'
                    }
                },

                grid: {
                    left: 0,
                    right: 0,
                    bottom: '3%',
                    containLabel: true
                }

            };

            // use configuration item and data specified to show chart
            payoutIndicatorsChart.setOption(payoutIndicatorsOption);
            const getJsonPayoutIndicators = (period = 3650) => {
                $("#loading-ticket-payout").show();
                const companyId = '35';
                const tickerName = 'BBAS3';
                const tickerId = '42';
                $.get(`/api/acoes/payout-chart/${companyId}/${tickerId}/${tickerName}/${period}`).done(function (data) {
                    const profitabilityArray = [];
                    const dyTickerIndicators = [];
                    const payOutCompanyIndicators = [];
                    const year = [];

                    $.each(data.years, (i, item) => {
                        year.push(item);
                    });

                    $.each(data.profitabilityArray, (i, item) => {
                        let topBorder = 5;
                        let bottomBorder = 0;
                        if (item.value < 0) {
                            topBorder = 0;
                            bottomBorder = 5;
                        }
                        profitabilityArray.push({
                            value: item.value,
                            itemStyle: {
                                normal: {
                                    barBorderRadius: [topBorder, topBorder, bottomBorder, bottomBorder]
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    });

                    $.each(data.dyTickerIndicators, (i, item) => {
                        dyTickerIndicators.push(item.value);
                    });

                    $.each(data.payOutCompanyIndicators, (i, item) => {
                        payOutCompanyIndicators.push(item.value);
                    });


                    let qtop = 50;
                    if (screen.width < 600) {
                        qtop = 80;
                    }

                    payoutIndicatorsChart.setOption({
                        legend: {
                            data: ['Lucro Líquido', 'Payout', 'Dividend Yield']
                        },
                        grid: {
                            top: qtop,
                            right: altRight
                        },
                        tooltip: {
                            trigger: "axis",
                            axisPointer: {
                                type: "shadow"
                            },
                            formatter: function (n) {
                                let text = "";
                                let year = "";
                                n.forEach(function (n, i) {
                                    let itemValue = typeof n.value == "undefined" || isNaN(n.value) || n.value === null || n.value === "" ? '0%' : `${parseFloat(n.value).toFixed(2)}%`;

                                    if (n.seriesName === 'Lucro Líquido') {
                                        itemValue = `R$ ${numberAbbreviation(n.value, true)}`;
                                    }

                                    year = `<span style="display:block;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;line-height:13pt; text-align: center">${n.name}</span>`;
                                    text += `<span style="display:flex; align-items: center;">
                                            <span style="display:block; width:10px; height:10px; margin-right: 5px; padding:1px; border-radius:10px; background-color:${n.color}"></span>
                                            <span style="display:block; margin-top:5px">
                                                <span style="display:block; font-size:8pt;line-height:9pt">${n.seriesName.toUpperCase()}:</span>
                                                <span style="display:block;font-weight: bold; font-size:9pt; line-height:10pt">${itemValue}</span>
                                            </span>
                                        </span>`
                                });
                                return `<div style="padding: 10px"> ${year + text}</div>`;
                            }
                        },
                        series: [
                            {
                                name: 'Lucro Líquido',
                                type: 'bar',
                                data: profitabilityArray,
                                color: '#2C3A53',
                            },
                            {
                                smooth: true,
                                name: 'Payout',
                                type: 'line',
                                data: payOutCompanyIndicators,
                                color: "#8BC34A",
                                yAxisIndex: 1,
                            },
                            {
                                smooth: true,
                                name: 'Dividend Yield',
                                type: 'line',
                                data: dyTickerIndicators,
                                color: "#FF9800",
                                yAxisIndex: 1,
                            }
                        ],
                        xAxis: {
                            data: year,
                            boundaryGap: true,
                            type: "category",
                            axisLabel: { color: "#778698" },
                            axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                        },
                        yAxis: [
                            {
                                type: "value",
                                position: "left",
                                axisLabel: {
                                    formatter: function (n) {
                                        if (screen.width < 600) {
                                            return numberAbbreviation(n, false, true)
                                        }
                                        return "R$" + numberAbbreviation(n)
                                    },
                                    color: "#778698"
                                },
                                splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                                axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                            },
                            {
                                type: "value",
                                position: "right",
                                axisLabel: {
                                    formatter: function (n) {
                                        return `${n}%`;
                                    },
                                    color: "#778698"
                                },
                                splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                                axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                            },
                        ]
                    });
                    $("#loading-ticket-payout").hide()

                });
            }

            $("select[name='balance-results-values-view']").on('change', function (e) {
                $("#table-balance-results").find('.simple-value').hide();
                $("#table-balance-results").find('.detail-value').hide();
                $("#table-balance-results").find('.' + e.target.value).show()
            });

            $("select[name='balance-sheet-values-view']").on('change', function (e) {
                $("#table-balance-sheet").find('.simple-value').hide();
                $("#table-balance-sheet").find('.detail-value').hide();
                $("#table-balance-sheet").find('.' + e.target.value).show()
            });

            $("select[name='company-values-view']").on('change', function (e) {
                $("#table-indicators-company").find('.simple-value').hide();
                $("#table-indicators-company").find('.detail-value').hide();
                $("#table-indicators-company").find('.' + e.target.value).show()
            });

            const getJsonBalanceSheet = (yearly = false) => {
                $("#loading-balance-sheet").show()
                $.get('/api/balancos/balancopatrimonial/chart/35/' + yearly + '/').done(function (data) {
                    let html = '';
                    const indexAV = [];
                    const indexAH = [];
                    $.each(data, (items_key, items) => {

                        if (items_key === 4) {
                            html += '<tr>';

                            $.each(items, (key, item) => {

                                let classColumn = 'column-value';

                                if (indexAV.includes(key)) {
                                    classColumn = 'column-av d-none';
                                }

                                if (indexAH.includes(key)) {
                                    classColumn = 'column-ah d-none';
                                }

                                html += `<td class="${classColumn}">&nbsp;</td>`;
                            });
                        }

                        html += '<tr>';

                        $.each(items, (key, item) => {
                            if (item === 'AV %') {
                                indexAV.push(key)
                            }

                            if (item === 'AH %') {
                                indexAH.push(key)
                            }

                            let classColumn = 'column-value';

                            if (indexAV.includes(key)) {
                                classColumn = 'column-av d-none';
                            }

                            if (indexAH.includes(key)) {
                                classColumn = 'column-ah d-none';
                            }

                            if (Array.isArray(item)) {
                                item = '<div class="simple-value">' + item[0] + '</div><div class="detail-value">' + item[1] + '</div>'
                            }

                            html += items_key === 0 ? `<th class="${classColumn}">${item}</th>` : `<td class="${classColumn}">${item}</td>`;
                        });
                        html += '</tr>';

                    });
                    $("#table-balance-sheet").html(html)
                    $("#loading-balance-sheet").hide()

                });
            }

            const getJsonBalanceResults = (period = 5, category = 'yearly') => {
                $("#loading-balance-results").show()
                $.get(`/api/balancos/balancoresultados/chart/35/${period}/${category}` + '/').done(function (data) {
                    let html = '';
                    const indexAV = [];
                    const indexAH = [];
                    $.each(data, (items_key, items) => {
                        html += '<tr>';
                        $.each(items, (key, item) => {
                            if (item === 'AV %') {
                                indexAV.push(key)
                            }

                            if (item === 'AH %') {
                                indexAH.push(key)
                            }

                            let classColumn = 'column-value';

                            if (indexAV.includes(key)) {
                                classColumn = 'column-av d-none';
                            }

                            if (indexAH.includes(key)) {
                                classColumn = 'column-ah d-none';
                            }

                            if (Array.isArray(item)) {
                                item = '<div class="simple-value">' + item[0] + '</div><div class="detail-value">' + item[1] + '</div>'
                            }

                            html += items_key === 0 ? `<th class="${classColumn}">${item}</th>` : `<td class="${classColumn}">${item}</td>`;
                        });
                        html += '</tr>';

                    });
                    $("#table-balance-results").html(html)
                    $("#loading-balance-results").hide()
                });
            }


            $(() => {
                $(".load-more-answers").on('click', function (e) {
                    let page = $(this).data('page');
                    $.ajax({
                        method: "GET",
                        url: page
                    })
                        .done(function (data) {
                            if (typeof data.count != "undefined") {
                                span.html(data.count)
                            }
                            return false;
                        })
                        .fail(function (err) {
                            console.log('ocorreu um erro ao dar o like')
                        });
                });

                $("#usePayments").on('change', function (e) {
                    let period = $(".period-quotation.active").data('period');
                    $('.showOnAdjusted').toggleClass('invisible');
                    getJsonQuotations(period, $(this).val() == 'adjusted');
                });

                $(".period-quotation").on('click', (e) => {
                    let period = $(e.target).data('period');

                    $(".period-quotation").removeClass('active')
                    $(e.target).addClass('active');

                    if (period) $("#period-quotation-select").val(period).trigger('change');
                })

                $("#period-quotation-select").on('change', (e) => {
                    let period = e.target.value;

                    getJsonQuotations(period)
                })

                $("#ticket-selector-select").on("change", function () {
                    let period = $(".period-quotation.active").data('period');

                    getJsonQuotations(period);
                });

                $(".period-assets-liabilities").on('click', (e) => {
                    let period = $(e.target).data('period');
                    if (period == 0) {
                        if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                            return
                        }
                    }
                    $(".period-assets-liabilities").not('[data-period=' + period + ']').removeClass('active');
                    $('.period-assets-liabilities[data-period=' + period + ']').addClass('active');
                    getJsonAssetsLiabilities(period)
                })

                $("#period-assets-liabilities-select").on('change', (e) => {
                    let period = e.target.value;

                    if (period == 0) {

                        if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                            return
                        }
                    }

                    getJsonAssetsLiabilities(period)
                })

                $(".period-net-revenue").on('click', (e) => {
                    const quarter = $("#quarter_period_net_revenue").val()
                    let period = $(e.target).data('period');

                    if (period > 3650 || period == 0) {

                        if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                            return
                        }
                    }

                    $(".period-net-revenue").removeClass('active')
                    $(e.target).addClass('active');
                    getJsonNetRevenue(period, quarter)
                })

                $("#period-net-revenue-select").on('change', (e) => {
                    const quarter = $("#quarter_period_net_revenue").val()
                    let period = e.target.value;

                    if (period > 3650 || period == 0) {

                        if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                            return
                        }
                    }

                    getJsonNetRevenue(period, quarter)
                })

                $("select[name='balance-sheet']").on('change', (e) => {
                    getJsonBalanceSheet(e.target.value)
                })

                $("select[name='balance-results-show-columns']").on('change', (e) => {
                    const value = e.target.value;

                    if (value === 'values') {
                        $("#table-balance-results .column-av, #table-balance-results .column-ah").addClass('d-none');
                    }

                    if (value === 'av') {
                        $("#table-balance-results .column-av").removeClass('d-none');
                        $("#table-balance-results .column-ah").addClass('d-none');
                    }

                    if (value === 'ah') {
                        $("#table-balance-results .column-av").addClass('d-none');
                        $("#table-balance-results .column-ah").removeClass('d-none');
                    }

                    if (value === 'av-ah') {
                        $("#table-balance-results .column-av, #table-balance-results .column-ah").removeClass('d-none');
                    }

                });

                $("select[name='balance-sheet-show-columns']").on('change', (e) => {
                    const value = e.target.value;

                    if (value === 'values') {
                        $("#table-balance-sheet .column-av,#table-balance-sheet .column-ah").addClass('d-none');
                    }

                    if (value === 'av') {
                        $("#table-balance-sheet .column-av").removeClass('d-none');
                        $("#table-balance-sheet .column-ah").addClass('d-none');
                    }

                    if (value === 'ah') {
                        $("#table-balance-sheet .column-av").addClass('d-none');
                        $("#table-balance-sheet .column-ah").removeClass('d-none');
                    }

                    if (value === 'av-ah') {
                        $("#table-balance-sheet .column-av, #table-balance-sheet .column-ah").removeClass('d-none');
                    }

                })

                $("select[name='balance-results-period'], select[name='balance-results-category']").on('change', (e) => {
                    let period = $("select[name='balance-results-period']").val();
                    let category = $("select[name='balance-results-category']").val();

                    if (period > 5) {

                        if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                            return
                        }
                    }

                    getJsonBalanceResults(period, category)
                })

                $("#quarter_period_net_revenue").on('change', (e) => {
                    const quarter = e.target.value;
                    let period = $('.period-net-revenue.active').data('period');
                    getJsonNetRevenue(period, quarter)
                })
            })

            let valueSimulator = 1000;

            $(".change-value-simulator").on('click', function (e) {
                Swal.fire({
                    text: 'Informe abaixo o valor que deseja simular',
                    input: 'text',
                    inputAttributes: {
                        autocapitalize: 'off',
                        id: 'input-value-simulator'
                    },
                    showCancelButton: true,
                    confirmButtonText: 'Alterar',
                    cancelButtonText: 'Cancelar',
                    showLoaderOnConfirm: true,
                    reverseButtons: true,
                    buttonsStyling: false,
                    didOpen: function (el) {
                        var container = $(el);
                        const input = container.find('#input-value-simulator');
                        input.val(valueSimulator)
                        input.maskMoney({
                            prefix: 'R$ ', allowNegative: true, thousands: '.', decimal: ',', affixesStay: false
                        }, valueSimulator).maskMoney('mask');
                    }
                }).then((result) => {
                    if (result.isConfirmed) {
                        valueSimulator = $('#input-value-simulator').maskMoney('unmasked')[0];
                        simulation()
                        simulator_compare()
                    }
                })
            })

            const simulation = () => {
                let html = '';
                valueSimulator = parseFloat(valueSimulator);


                lastProfitability = (lastPriceCotation.price / firstPriceCotation.price) * 100;


                let result = (valueSimulator * lastProfitability) / 100;


                html += `R$ ${formatMoney(result, 2, ",", ".")}`

                $("#result-simulator").html(html);
                $("#value-simulator").html('R$ ' + formatMoney(valueSimulator, 2, ",", "."));
            }

                            TickerShow.DividendChart.init();

                var getMonthName = (monthNumber) => {
                    let monthsMap = [];
                    monthsMap[0] = 'Janeiro',
                    monthsMap[1] = 'Fevereiro',
                    monthsMap[2] = 'Março',
                    monthsMap[3] = 'Abril',
                    monthsMap[4] = 'Maio',
                    monthsMap[5] = 'Junho',
                    monthsMap[6] = 'Julho',
                    monthsMap[7] = 'Agosto',
                    monthsMap[8] = 'Setembro',
                    monthsMap[9] = 'Outubro',
                    monthsMap[10] = 'Novembro',
                    monthsMap[11] = 'Dezembro';

                    if (typeof monthsMap[monthNumber] === 'undefined') {
                        return '';
                    }

                    return monthsMap[monthNumber];
                }

                function showBasileiaChart(period) {
                    $(".loading-basileia-index").show();
                    $("#chart-basileia-index").show();

                    let companyId = '35';
                    var chartDom = document.getElementById('chart-basileia-index');
                    var myChart = echarts.init(chartDom);

                    // Função para obter o estado das séries selecionadas
                    function getSelectedSeries(myChart) {
                        const option = myChart.getOption();
                        let selected = {};

                        if (option && option.legend && option.legend[0] && option.legend[0].selected) {
                            selected = option.legend[0].selected;
                        }

                        return selected;
                    }

                    // Função para definir o estado das séries selecionadas
                    function setSelectedSeries(myChart, selected) {
                        const option = myChart.getOption();

                        if (option && option.legend && option.legend[0]) {
                            option.legend[0].selected = selected;
                            myChart.setOption(option);
                        }
                    }

                    // Salvar o estado das séries selecionadas antes do recarregamento
                    const selectedSeries = getSelectedSeries(myChart);

                    $.get(`/api/balancos/indice-basileia-chart/${companyId}/${period}/?v=4`, function (data) {
                        let dleft = 65;
                        let dright = 25;
                        let gridTop = 35;

                        if (screen.width <= 768) {
                            gridTop = 65;
                        }

                        if (screen.width <= 767) {
                            $("#chart-basileia-index").css('margin-top', '80px');
                            $("#filters-period-basileia").css({"position": "absolute", "z-index": 999999});
                            gridTop = 65;
                        }

                        if (screen.width < 600) {
                            dleft = 30;
                            dright = 10;
                            gridTop = 85;
                        }

                        if (screen.width <= 480) {
                            gridTop = 85;
                        }

                        // Extrair os quarters, assumindo que todos são iguais. Pegando de AVG, pois é o unico item que podemos ter certeza que sempre existirá no array de objetos.
                        var quarters = data["AVG"].map(item => item.quarter);

                        var series = [];
                        var legendData = [];
                        var firstItemKey = Object.keys(data)[0];

                        series.push({
                            name: firstItemKey,
                            type: 'line',
                            data: data[firstItemKey].map(item => parseFloat(item.value)),
                            selected: true
                        });
                        legendData.push(firstItemKey);

                        series.push({
                            name: 'MÉDIA DO SETOR',
                            type: 'line',
                            data: data['AVG'].map(item => parseFloat(item.value)),
                            selected: true
                        });
                        legendData.push('MÉDIA DO SETOR');

                        for (var key in data) {
                            if (key !== firstItemKey && key !== 'AVG') {
                                series.push({
                                    name: key,
                                    type: 'line',
                                    data: data[key].map(item => item.value ? parseFloat(item.value) : null),
                                    selected: false
                                });
                                legendData.push(key);
                            }
                        }

                        var minValue = Math.min(...Object.values(data).flat().map(item => item.value !== null ? parseFloat(item.value) : 20));
                        var maxValue = Math.max(...Object.values(data).flat().map(item => item.value !== null ? parseFloat(item.value) : item.value));

                        var option = {
                            grid: {
                                left: dleft,
                                top: gridTop,
                                right: dright,
                                bottom: 25,
                                borderColor: "#f00"
                            },
                            tooltip: {
                                trigger: "axis",
                                axisPointer: {
                                    type: "cross",
                                    animation: !1,
                                    label: {
                                        backgroundColor: "#ccc",
                                        borderColor: "#aaa",
                                        borderWidth: 1,
                                        shadowBlur: 0,
                                        shadowOffsetX: 0,
                                        shadowOffsetY: 0,
                                        textStyle: {
                                            color: "#222"
                                        }
                                    }
                                },
                                formatter: function (params) {
                                    var tooltipText = params[0].name + '<br>';
                                    params.forEach(function (item) {
                                        if(item.value == null) {
                                            return;
                                        }
                                        tooltipText += item.marker + item.seriesName + ': ' + item.value.toFixed(2) + '%<br>';
                                    });
                                    return tooltipText;
                                }
                            },
                            legend: {
                                data: legendData,
                                selected: Object.assign(
                                    series.reduce((acc, item) => {
                                        acc[item.name] = item.name === 'MÉDIA DO SETOR' || item.name === firstItemKey;
                                        return acc;
                                    }, {}),
                                    selectedSeries
                                )
                            },
                            xAxis: {
                                type: 'category',
                                data: quarters,
                                boundaryGap: true,
                                position: 'left',
                            },
                            yAxis: {
                                type: 'value',
                                position: 'left',
                                axisLabel: {
                                    formatter: "{value} %"
                                },
                                min: Math.floor(minValue) - 2,
                                max: Math.floor(maxValue) + 2
                            },
                            series
                        };

                        console.log(option);
                        option && myChart.setOption(option);

                        $(".loading-basileia-index").hide();
                    }, 'json');
                }
            
            $('#table-indicators-history').on('click', '.indicator-history-graph', function () {
                let indicator = $(this).data('indicator');
                OpenPopuploadGraphIndicatorHistory(indicator)
            })

            $(".period-indicator-history").on('click', (e) => {

                let period = $(e.target).data('period');

                if (period > 5) {

                    if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                        return
                    }
                }

                $('#loading-indicators-history').show();

                $(".period-indicator-history").removeClass('active')
                $(e.target).addClass('active');
                getJsonIndicatorsHistory(period)
            })

            const getJsonIndicatorsHistory = (period = 5) => {
                $.get(`/api/historico-indicadores/42/${period}/?v=2`).done(function (data) {

                    if (data == "") {
                        $('#indicators-history').hide();
                    }

                    data_indicator_history = data;
                    let thead = `<tr><th>&nbsp;</th>`;
                    let start = false;
                    let content = ``;

                    $.each(data, (items_key, items) => {

                        content += `<tr><td class='indicator'>${items_key}&nbsp; <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="indicator-history-graph" data-indicator="${items_key}"><i class="fas fa-chart-area"></i></a></td>`;

                        $.each(items, (item_key, item) => {
                            if (!start) {
                                thead += `<th class='year'>${item.year}</th>`;
                            }

                            content += `
                            <td class='value'>${formatMoney(item.value, 2, ',')}${(item.type == 'percent') ? '%' : ''}</td>
                    `

                        });

                        content += `</tr>`
                        start = true;

                    });

                    thead += '</tr>';

                    html = thead + content;

                    $("#table-indicators-history").html(html)
                    $("#loading-indicators-history").hide()
                });
            }


            const chooseChart = (period) => {
                if (period == 60) {
                    compareChart.setOption({
                        series: series5,
                        xAxis: {
                            data: dates5
                        },
                        legend: {
                            data: legend5
                        },

                    });
                    lastProfitabilityCompare = JSON.parse(`{"BBAS3":{"value":199.6,"type":"Ticker"},"IBOV":{"value":83.47,"type":"Index"},"CDI":{"value":52.72,"type":"CdiQuotation"},"IPCA":{"value":34.71,"type":"Ipca"},"SMLL":{"value":18,"type":"Index"},"IFIX":{"value":34.8,"type":"Index"},"IDIV":{"value":106.06,"type":"Index"},"IVVB11":{"value":148.78,"type":"Etf"}}`);
                }

                if (period == 120) {
                    compareChart.setOption({
                        series: series10,
                        xAxis: {
                            data: dates10
                        },
                        legend: {
                            data: legend10
                        }
                    });
                    lastProfitabilityCompare = JSON.parse(`{"BBAS3":{"value":320.12,"type":"Ticker"},"IBOV":{"value":148.85,"type":"Index"},"CDI":{"value":140.22,"type":"CdiQuotation"},"IPCA":{"value":70.93,"type":"Ipca"},"SMLL":{"value":85.8,"type":"Index"},"IFIX":{"value":145.32,"type":"Index"},"IDIV":{"value":252.17,"type":"Index"},"IVVB11":{"value":437.47,"type":"Etf"}}`);
                }

                if (period == 24) {
                    compareChart.setOption({
                        series: series2,
                        xAxis: {
                            data: dates2
                        },
                        legend: {
                            data: legend2
                        },
                    });
                    lastProfitabilityCompare = JSON.parse(`{"BBAS3":{"value":65.58,"type":"Ticker"},"IBOV":{"value":27.8,"type":"Index"},"CDI":{"value":23.89,"type":"CdiQuotation"},"IPCA":{"value":9.01,"type":"Ipca"},"SMLL":{"value":5.66,"type":"Index"},"IFIX":{"value":20.32,"type":"Index"},"IDIV":{"value":36.58,"type":"Index"},"IVVB11":{"value":56.6,"type":"Etf"}}`);
                }

                simulator_compare();
            }

            $(".period-profitabilities").on('click', function (e) {
                let period = $(e.target).data('period');

                if (period > 60 && restrict(userAuth, userIsPro)) {
                    return;
                }

                $(".period-profitabilities").not('[data-period=' + period + ']').removeClass('active');
                $('.period-profitabilities[data-period=' + period + ']').addClass('active');
                $("#period-profitabilities-select").val(period).trigger('change')
                $('.simulation_period_c').html($(e.target).html())

            })

            $("#period-profitabilities-select").on('change', function (e) {
                let period = e.target.value;

                if (period > 60 && restrict(userAuth, userIsPro)) {
                    return;
                }

                chooseChart(period);
            })

            const dates10 = JSON.parse(`["04\/15","05\/15","06\/15","07\/15","08\/15","09\/15","10\/15","11\/15","12\/15","01\/16","02\/16","03\/16","04\/16","05\/16","06\/16","07\/16","08\/16","09\/16","10\/16","11\/16","12\/16","01\/17","02\/17","03\/17","04\/17","05\/17","06\/17","07\/17","08\/17","09\/17","10\/17","11\/17","12\/17","01\/18","02\/18","03\/18","04\/18","05\/18","06\/18","07\/18","08\/18","09\/18","10\/18","11\/18","12\/18","01\/19","02\/19","03\/19","04\/19","05\/19","06\/19","07\/19","08\/19","09\/19","10\/19","11\/19","12\/19","01\/20","02\/20","03\/20","04\/20","05\/20","06\/20","07\/20","08\/20","09\/20","10\/20","11\/20","12\/20","01\/21","02\/21","03\/21","04\/21","05\/21","06\/21","07\/21","08\/21","09\/21","10\/21","11\/21","12\/21","01\/22","02\/22","03\/22","04\/22","05\/22","06\/22","07\/22","08\/22","09\/22","10\/22","11\/22","12\/22","01\/23","02\/23","03\/23","04\/23","05\/23","06\/23","07\/23","08\/23","09\/23","10\/23","11\/23","12\/23","01\/24","02\/24","03\/24","04\/24","05\/24","06\/24","07\/24","08\/24","09\/24","10\/24","11\/24","12\/24","01\/25","02\/25","03\/25","04\/25"]`)
            const dates5 = JSON.parse(`["04\/20","05\/20","06\/20","07\/20","08\/20","09\/20","10\/20","11\/20","12\/20","01\/21","02\/21","03\/21","04\/21","05\/21","06\/21","07\/21","08\/21","09\/21","10\/21","11\/21","12\/21","01\/22","02\/22","03\/22","04\/22","05\/22","06\/22","07\/22","08\/22","09\/22","10\/22","11\/22","12\/22","01\/23","02\/23","03\/23","04\/23","05\/23","06\/23","07\/23","08\/23","09\/23","10\/23","11\/23","12\/23","01\/24","02\/24","03\/24","04\/24","05\/24","06\/24","07\/24","08\/24","09\/24","10\/24","11\/24","12\/24","01\/25","02\/25","03\/25","04\/25"]`)
            const dates2 = JSON.parse(`["04\/23","05\/23","06\/23","07\/23","08\/23","09\/23","10\/23","11\/23","12\/23","01\/24","02\/24","03\/24","04\/24","05\/24","06\/24","07\/24","08\/24","09\/24","10\/24","11\/24","12\/24","01\/25","02\/25","03\/25","04\/25"]`)

            const legend10 = JSON.parse(`["BBAS3","IBOV","CDI","IPCA","SMLL","IFIX","IDIV","IVVB11"]`);
            const legend5 = JSON.parse(`["BBAS3","IBOV","CDI","IPCA","SMLL","IFIX","IDIV","IVVB11"]`);
            const legend2 = JSON.parse(`["BBAS3","IBOV","CDI","IPCA","SMLL","IFIX","IDIV","IVVB11"]`);

            const series10 = [
                                    {
