                        return [i.date, i.profitability, i.price, i.type]
                    }),
                    type: 'line',
                    symbol: 'none'
                },
                            ];


            // based on prepared DOM, initialize echarts instance
            var compareChart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('chart-profitability'));
            let lastProfitabilityCompare = JSON.parse(`{"BBAS3":{"value":199.6,"type":"Ticker"},"IBOV":{"value":83.47,"type":"Index"},"CDI":{"value":52.72,"type":"CdiQuotation"},"IPCA":{"value":34.71,"type":"Ipca"},"SMLL":{"value":18,"type":"Index"},"IFIX":{"value":34.8,"type":"Index"},"IDIV":{"value":106.06,"type":"Index"},"IVVB11":{"value":148.78,"type":"Etf"}}`);
            let qtop = 25;
            let cleft = qleft;
            if (screen.width < 600) {
                qtop = 55;
                cleft = 50;
            }
            if (screen.width < 400) {
                qtop = 75;
            }

            let selected = {};
            for (let i = 0; i < legend5.length; i++) {
                let startSelected = false;
                if (i === 0 || legend5[i] === 'IBOV' || legend5[i] === 'IFIX') {
                    startSelected = true;
                }

                selected[legend5[i]] = startSelected;
            }

            let entries = Object.entries(selected);
            entries.splice(2, 0, ['IFIX', true]);
            selected = Object.fromEntries(entries);
            legend5.splice(2, 0, "IFIX");

            quotationOption = {
                grid: {
                    left: cleft,
                    top: qtop,
                    right: qright,
                    bottom: 25,
                    borderColor: "#f00"
                },
                xAxis: {
                    type: 'category',
                    boundaryGap: true,
                    data: dates5,
                    axisLabel: { color: "#778698" },
                    axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                },
                legend: {
                    data: legend5,
                    selected
                },
                yAxis: {
                    type: 'value',
                    axisLabel: {
                        formatter: function (value) {
                            return numberAbbreviation(value, true, true) + '%'
                        },
                        color: "#778698",
                    },
                    splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                    axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                },
                tooltip: {
                    trigger: "axis",
                    axisPointer: {
                        type: "cross",
                        animation: !1,
                        label: {
                            backgroundColor: "#ccc",
                            borderColor: "#aaa",
                            borderWidth: 1,
                            shadowBlur: 0,
                            shadowOffsetX: 0,
                            shadowOffsetY: 0,
                            textStyle: {
                                color: "#222"
                            }
                        }
                    },
                    formatter: function (n) {
                        let html = '';
                        let name = '';

                        n.forEach((i, a) => {
                            name = `<p style="color: white"><strong>${i.name}</strong></p>`;

                            if (i.value[3] == 'index') {
                                let points = parseFloat(i.value[2]).toLocaleString('pt-BR', {
                                    minimumFractionDigits: 2,
                                    maximumFractionDigits: 2
                                });
                                var price = `(${points})`
                            } else {
                                var price = `(R$ ${numberAbbreviation(i.value[2], true)})`
                            }

                            html += `<div class='d-flex align-items-center'>
                                <span style="width:10px; height:10px;margin-right: 5px; padding:1px;border-radius:10px; background-color:${i.color}"></span>
                                <div>${i.seriesName}: <strong>${numberAbbreviation(i.value[1], true)}%</strong></div>
                            </div>`;
                        })

                        return name + html;
                    }
                },
                series: series5,
            };
            compareChart.setOption(quotationOption);


            const simulator_compare = () => {
                let html = '';
                valueSimulator = parseFloat(valueSimulator);
                let j = 0;
                Object.keys(lastProfitabilityCompare).forEach((i, e) => {
                    let result = (valueSimulator * lastProfitabilityCompare[i].value) / 100;
                    result = valueSimulator + result;
                    let button = "";

                    if (j === 0) {
                        button = `<a href="/acoes/${i.toLowerCase()}/" class="action">${i}</a>`;
                    } else if (i === 'IVVB11') {
                        // Caso seja adicionado outro item que não seja item, precisa fazer a mesma validação nesse novo item
                        button = `<a href="/etfs/${i.toLowerCase()}/" class="action">${i}</a>`;
                    } else {
                        button = `<a href="/indices/${i.toLowerCase()}/" class="action">${i}</a>`;
                    }

                    html += `<p>${button}<span class="desktop"> R$ ${formatMoney(valueSimulator, 2, ",", ".")} em ${i} você teria </span><span class="valor">R$ ${formatMoney(result, 2, ",", ".")}</span></p>`;
                    j++;
                });
                $("#simulators_compare").html(html);
                $("#value-simulator_compare").html('R$ ' + formatMoney(valueSimulator, 2, ",", "."));
            }

            const getJsonQuotationProfit = (adjusted) => {
                $.getJSON(`/api/cotacao-lucro/bbas3/${adjusted}/`).done(function (data) {
                    let quotations = [];
                    let profit = [];
                    let years = [];

                    $.each(data, (key, item) => {
                        quotations.push(item.quotation)
                        years.push(key);
                        profit.push(item.net_profit);
                    });

                    var quotationProfitGraph = echarts.init(document.getElementById('graph-quotation-profit-' + adjusted));

                    let qmargin = 80;
                    if (screen.width < 600) {
                        qmargin = 35;
                    }

                    quotationProfitGraphOption = {
                        baseOption: {
                            animationDuration: 300,
                            grid: {
                                left: qmargin,
                                top: 40,
                                right: qmargin,
                                bottom: 25,
                                borderColor: "#f00"
                            },
                            xAxis: {
                                type: 'category',
                                boundaryGap: true,
                                data: years,
                                axisLabel: { color: "#778698" },
                                axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                            },
                            legend: {
                                data: ['Lucro Líquido', 'Cotação']
                            },
                            yAxis: [
                                {
                                    type: 'value',
                                    minInterval: 0.01,
                                    min: Number(Math.min(...quotations) * 0.8).toFixed(2), //sub 20%
                                    max: Number(Math.max(...quotations) * 1.05).toFixed(2), //add 20%
                                    position: 'right',
                                    axisLabel: {
                                        formatter: function (value) {
                                            if (screen.width < 600) {
                                                return numberAbbreviation(value, true, true)
                                            }
                                            return 'R$' + numberAbbreviation(value, true)
                                        },
                                        color: "#778698",
                                    },
                                    splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                                    axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                                },
                                {
                                    type: 'value',
                                    position: 'left',
                                    minInterval: 0.01,
                                    //min: Number(Math.min(...profit) * 0.8).toFixed(2), //sub 20%
                                    max: Number(Math.max(...profit) * 1.05).toFixed(2), //add 20%
                                    axisLabel: {
                                        formatter: function (value) {
                                            if (screen.width < 600) {
                                                return numberAbbreviation(value, false, true)
                                            }
                                            return 'R$' + numberAbbreviation(value)
                                        },
                                        color: "#778698",
                                    },
                                    splitLine: { lineStyle: { color: '#F5F6F7' } },
                                    axisLine: { lineStyle: { color: "#E3E6ED" } },
                                },
                            ],
                            tooltip: {
                                trigger: "axis",
                                axisPointer: {
                                    type: "shadow"
                                },
                                formatter: function (n) {
                                    let text = "";
                                    let year = "";
                                    n.forEach(function (n) {
                                        year = `<span style="display:block;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;line-height:13pt; text-align: center">${n.name}</span>`;
                                        text += `<span style="display:flex; align-items: center;">
                                                <span style="display:block; width:10px; height:10px; margin-right: 5px; padding:1px; border-radius:10px; background-color:${n.color}"></span>
                                                <span style="display:block; margin-top:5px">
                                                    <span style="display:block; font-size:8pt;line-height:9pt">${n.seriesName.toUpperCase()}:</span>
                                                    <span style="display:block;font-weight: bold; font-size:9pt; line-height:10pt">R$ ${numberAbbreviation(n.value, true)}</span>
                                                </span>
                                            </span>`
                                    });
                                    return `<div style="padding: 10px"> ${year + text}</div>`;
                                }
                            },
                            series: [
                                {
                                    name: 'Cotação',
                                    type: 'line',
                                    sampling: 'average',
                                    itemStyle: {
                                        color: '#A38C65',
                                        fontStyle: 'bolder',
                                    },
                                    smooth: true,
                                    data: quotations,
                                    label: {
                                        show: false,
                                        position: 'top',
                                        color: '#A38C65',
                                    },
                                },
                                {
                                    name: 'Lucro Líquido',
                                    type: 'line',
                                    sampling: 'average',
                                    itemStyle: {
                                        color: '#0d9066',
                                        fontStyle: 'bolder',
                                    },
                                    yAxisIndex: 1,
                                    smooth: true,
                                    data: profit,
                                    label: {
                                        show: false,
                                        position: 'top',
                                        color: '#A38C65',
                                    },
                                }
                            ]
                        },
                    };
                    quotationProfitGraph.setOption(quotationProfitGraphOption);
                });
            }

            $(".period-ticket-payout").click(function () {
                const period = $(this).data('period');
                if (period > 1825 || period == 0) {
                    if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                        return;
                    }
                }
                $('.period-ticket-payout').removeClass('active');

                $(`.period-ticket-payout[data-period=${period}]`).addClass('active');
                getJsonPayoutIndicators(period);
            })

            $(".period-basileia-index").click(function () {
                $(".loading-basileia-index").show()
                $("#chart-basileia-index").show()
                const period = $(this).data('period');
                if (period > 1825 || period == 0) {
                    if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                        $(".loading-basileia-index").hide()
                        return;
                    }
                }
                $('.period-basileia-index').removeClass('active');

                $(this).addClass('active');
                showBasileiaChart(period);
            })

            setTimeout(() => {
                $(".period-quotation").eq(4).click();
                $(".period-net-revenue").eq(1).click();
                $(".period-assets-liabilities").eq(1).click();
                $(".period-dividends").eq(1).click();
                $(".period-dividend-yield").eq(1).click();
                $(".period-indicator-history").eq(0).click();
                $(".period-profitabilities").eq(1).click();
                $(".period-basileia-index").eq(0).click();

                                $(".period-ticket-payout").eq(0).click();
                
                getJsonBalanceSheet(true);
                getJsonBalanceResults(5, 'yearly');
                                //getJsonQuotationProfit('');
                getJsonQuotationProfit('adjusted');
                                showBasileiaChart(1825)
            });
        });

        let selectedFilter = [];

        // on loaded
        $(document).ready(function () {
            filterDataForm();

            $('#container-box-rdi #filter-data div').click(function() {
                if ($(this).hasClass('active')) {
                    return;
                }

                $('#container-box-rdi #filter-data div').removeClass('active');

                $(this).toggleClass('active');

                filterDataForm(`${$(this).attr('id')}=1`);
            });

            let optionsReadMore = {
                hideText: "fa fa-chevron-up",
                readText: "fa fa-chevron-down",
                isTextShown: false,
                id: "read-more-action",
                buttonClasses: "btn-readmore"

            }

            let optionsReadMoreBiography = {
                hideText: "LER MENOS",
                readText: "LEIA MAIS",
                isTextShown: false,
                //id: "read-more-action",
                buttonClasses: "btn-readmore text",
                isTextButton: true
            }

            $(".read-more.indicator-history").readmore(optionsReadMore);
            $(".read-more.biography").readmore(optionsReadMoreBiography);
            $(".read-more.relevant-points").readmore(optionsReadMore);

            if ($("#table-compare-tickers tbody tr").length >= 6) {
                $("#compare-tickers.read-more").readmore(optionsReadMore);
            }

            if ($("#table-comunication tbody tr").length >= 6) {
                $(".read-more#container-comunications").readmore(optionsReadMore);
            }

            if (screen.width < 600) {
                $(".read-more.negative_good_points").readmore(optionsReadMore);
                //$(".read-more.graham").readmore(optionsReadMore);
            }

            $(".read-more.graham").readmore(optionsReadMore);
            $(".read-more.bazin").readmore(optionsReadMore);
        });

        function filterDataForm(filterValueSelected) {
            let filterParam = 'companies='+35;

            if (filterValueSelected) {
                filterParam += '&'+filterValueSelected;
            }

            $.ajax({
                url: `/api/acoes/dividends-map`,
                type: 'GET',
                dataType: 'json',
                headers: {
                    'X-CSRF-TOKEN': 'jkAf57Cgg09tDSr2e5yb6uDUSfRVNbpywFgY8XyG',
                    'Accept': 'application/json',
                },
                data: {
                    'filter': filterParam,
                    'showMoreResults': true
                },
                success: function (data) {
                    $('#container-cards-dividends').html(data.dividendsCards);

                    if ($('#empty-result').length > 0) {
                        $('#radar-dividends').remove();
                    }
                }
            });
        }

        $('.container-title-question').click(function() {
            $(this).toggleClass('active');
            $('.container-answer-question[rel='+$(this).attr('rel')+']').toggleClass('active');
        });

        $(document).on('click', '.btn-download-communication', function (event) {
            if (restrict(userAuth, true)) {
                event.preventDefault();

                return;
            }
        });

    </script>

          $('.modal-default').removeClass('show')

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            const els = document.querySelectorAll('.click-ga-event');

            els.forEach((el) => {
                el.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    const eventLabel = el.getAttribute('data-event');
                    const eventName = eventLabel.replace(/ /g, '_').replace(/-/g, '_');

                    const eventPayload = {
                        'event_category': 'notification',
                        'event_label': eventLabel
                    };
                    // console.log(eventPayload)
                    gtag('event', eventName, eventPayload);
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>

</html>
